-= Kitchen =-
You arrive in a kitchen. A typical kind of place.

You can make out a fridge. You see an oven. Huh, weird. Oh, great. Here's a table. On the table you can see a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a counter. You see a fried banana, a red apple, a red hot pepper, a raw yellow potato and a cookbook on the counter. Hmmm... what else, what else? You see a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

You can make out a fridge. You see an oven. Huh, weird. Oh, great. Here's a table. On the table you can see a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a counter. You see a fried banana, a red apple, a red hot pepper, a raw yellow potato and a cookbook on the counter. Hmmm... what else, what else? You see a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
You arrive in a kitchen. A typical kind of place.

You can make out a fridge. You see an oven. Huh, weird. Oh, great. Here's a table. On the table you can see a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a counter. You see a fried banana, a red apple, a red hot pepper, a raw yellow potato and a cookbook on the counter. Hmmm... what else, what else? You see a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

-= Kitchen =-
You arrive in a kitchen. A typical kind of place.

You can make out a fridge. You see an oven. Huh, weird. Oh, great. Here's a table. On the table you can see a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a counter. You see a fried banana, a red apple, a red hot pepper, a raw yellow potato and a cookbook on the counter. Hmmm... what else, what else? You see a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
You arrive in a kitchen. A typical kind of place.

You can make out a fridge. You see an oven. Huh, weird. Oh, great. Here's a table. On the table you can see a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a counter. You see a fried banana, a red apple, a red hot pepper, a raw yellow potato and a cookbook on the counter. Hmmm... what else, what else? You see a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
You arrive in a kitchen. A typical kind of place.

You can make out a fridge. You see an oven. Huh, weird. Oh, great. Here's a table. On the table you can see a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a counter. You see a fried banana, a red apple, a red hot pepper, a raw yellow potato and a cookbook on the counter. Hmmm... what else, what else? You see a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.
